label: Description of policy:
description: Text input to describe policy

label: Select a proposal…
description: Dropdown to select from established IUU proposals

label: Subsidies for fishing shall be prohibited to those…
choice_names: Currently listed as having engaged in IUU fishing activities by an RFMO or international agreement; Found to have engaged in IUU fishing activities by a coastal Member state; Found to have engaged in IUU fishing activities by a flag Member state; Found to have engaged in IUU fishing activities by the subsidizing Member state
description: Checkbox to select specific IUU disciplines

label: Would you like to make an assumption about IUU fishing worldwide instead?
description: Yes/No to make iuu assumption

label: Assumed amount of fishing effort identified as IUU (%):
description: Slider to set value of assumed IUU fishing

label: Discipline(s) apply to:
description: Scope for selected IUU disciplines

label: Select Member(s):
description: Manually select Members to apply IUU disciplines to

label: Allow S&DT?
description: Yes/No to allow S&DT for IUU disciplines

label: S&DT applies to:
description: Scope for IUU S&DT

label: S&DT:
description: S&DT for IUU disciplines

label: Select a proposal…
description: Dropdown to select from established OA proposals

label: Subsidies for fishing shall be prohibited if the fish stock…
choice_names: Is considered to be overfished (B/Bmsy < 0.8) by the most recent stock assessment in the RAM Legacy Stock Assessment database; Is considered to be overfished (B/Bmsy < 0.8) as determined by Costello et al. (2016)
description: Checkbox to select specific OA disciplines

label: Discipline(s) apply to:
choice_names: All Members; Only Member-flagged vessels fishing in areas beyond national jurisdiction (on the "high seas"); Only Member-flagged vessels fishing in the EEZs of other coastal states; Only Member-flagged vessels fishing on the high seas or in the EEZs of other coastal states; Only vessels flagged to the 10 Member states responsible for providing the most capacity-enhancing fisheries subsidies; Only vessels fishing in disputed areas; Only vessels over a certain length threshold; Only vessels over a certain gross tonnage threshold; Only vessels over a certain engine power threshold; Only vessels meeting at least two of the specified length, gross tonnage, and engine power characteristics; Select Members...
description: Scope for selected OA disciplines

label: Select Member(s):
description: Manually select Members to apply OA disciplines to

label: What constitutes a high seas vessel?\n (min % of total fishing effort \n on the high seas)
description: Slider to set cutoff for high seas fishing

label: Minimum total vessel length (m)
description: Slider to set cutoff for vessel length

label: Minimum total vessel tonnage (gt)
description: Slider to set cutoff for vessel tonnage

label: Minimum total vessel engine power (kW)
description: Slider to set cutoff for vessel engine power

label: Allow S&DT?
description: Yes/No to allow S&DT for OA disciplines

label: S&DT applies to:
description: Scope for OA S&DT
